title: I don't know what happened but it's looking like Illaoi is secretly busted.
body:
I'm not even fucking joking, I don't know if it's a bug or something but I'm getting smashed by the damage from her test of spirit. It's nuts, She used one smash after jumping on me with her ult and the tentacles did like 600 to me, test of spirit did 700. WTF is this, I took 1600 damage in 1 second. She had Black Cleaver, Edge of Night, Pickaxe, Caulfield Hammer. Instantly 1600 damage, I built full tank and had the shield from Courage of the Colossus.

Oh and it was all under our tower.
